summary: The Honest Operations for National Cemetery Reporting Act of 2025 aims to increase transparency within the National Cemetery Administration (NCA). It mandates the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to publish interment schedule availability on the NCA website, defining and reporting on this data. Additionally, the bill addresses customer service surveys, urging continued participation in the American Customer Satisfaction Index survey and requiring Congressional notification of changes. It also mandates the continued administration and publication of NCA customer service surveys, requiring prior Congressional notice of any methodology changes.
